thread.title: Wonderful surprise at the United Nations!
thread.title_full: Wonderful surprise at the United Nations! - Review of ONE UN New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Linnol
title: Wonderful surprise at the United Nations!
text: Everything about this hotel was great. The price was reasonable (found a deal on the website). The staff was wonderful. I had to change the room type and the front desk was happy to help. We had a beautiful view of the river. Room was very nice and a good size. Location was good. We ended up walking to the theater district and found some great restaurants and bars nearby. Easy access to grand central. I will definitely be back.
